original_text:
Thus says the Lord:
“Behold, a people is coming from the north country,
    a great nation is stirring from the farthest parts of the earth.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 보라 한 민족이 북방에서 오며 큰 나라가 땅 끝에서부터 떨쳐 일어나나니

sentences.original_text: a people is coming from the north country,
a great nation is stirring from the farthest parts of the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 나라가 땅 끝에서 일어나고 있다
